casebody.data:
In the Matter of C.M.W. No. 239P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Richard Croutharmel, Apex, for Juvenile.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of May 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
